summary: Separated by a garden fence and a feud, are blue gnomes on one side and red gnomes on the other. This doesn't stop blue Gnomeo and red Juliet from falling in love with each other. Do they have a future together?
cast: James McAvoy|Emily Blunt|Ashley Jensen|Michael Caine|Matt Lucas|Jim Cummings|Maggie Smith|Jason Statham|Ozzy Osbourne|Stephen Merchant|Patrick Stewart|Julie Walters|Hulk Hogan|Kelly Asbury|Richard Wilson|Dolly Parton|Julia Braams|James Daniel Wilson|Tim Bentinck|Julio Bonet|Neil McCaul|Maurissa Horwitz|Chris Cresswell|John Todd
title: Gnomeo y Julieta
